data.oai_dc:dc: This is an Excel workbook containing spreadsheets on restoration of fertility (female egg count), Spiroplasma density (qPCR-Spiroplasma), Howardula motherworm size (Motherworm size), and maternal transmission (Maternal transmission). These data were collected in either the Perlman (University of Victoria) or Jaenike (University of Rochester), as indicated in the file.
